TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientScriptItem extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示在設計階段中 Web Form 或使用者控制項中的用戶端指令碼項目。

span.span: Represents a client script element in a Web Form or user control at design time.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表`script`Web 文件中包含在設計階段的項目。The class represents a `script` element that is contained in a Web document at design time. 自訂控制項設計工具的實作可以使用將用戶端指令碼項目新增至 Web 表單或使用者控制項的物件。A custom control designer implementation can use a object to add client script elements to a Web Form or user control. 在設計階段使用設定或檢查用戶端指令碼項目中的文件，例如 Web form、 Web 伺服器控制項、 內容的頁面上或主版頁面，在設計介面上的所包含的類別。At design time, use the class to set or examine client script elements that are contained in a document, such as a Web form, a Web server control, a content page, or a master page, on the design surface. 擷取包含在 Web 文件中使用的用戶端指令碼項目的集合方法。Retrieve the collection of client script elements that are contained within the Web document by using the method. 加入 Web 文件中的用戶端指令碼項目，使用方法。Add a client script element to the Web document by using the method. 一般而言，`script`項目包含指令碼陳述式，或指定的指令碼陳述式外部位置。Typically, a `script` element either contains script statements or specifies an external location for script statements. `script`元素可以選擇性地定義指令碼陳述式的語言。The `script` element can optionally define the language of the script statements. 使用建構函式來初始化新的指令碼物件的屬性。Use the constructor to initialize the properties for a new script object. 使用內容，以檢查`script`物件屬性和內容。Use the properties to examine the `script` object attributes and contents. 屬性代表`language`屬性`script`項目。The property represents the `language` attribute of the `script` element. 屬性表示`src`屬性。The property represents the `src` attribute. 屬性表示要包含在用戶端上執行的指令碼陳述式`script`項目。The property represents the script statements to be executed on the client that are contained in the `script` element. 使用類別以管理要在設計階段執行的指令碼。Use the class to manage scripts that are to be executed at design-time. 若要在執行階段中管理用戶端指令碼項目，請使用類別。To manage client script elements at run time, use the class. 如需使用用戶端指令碼在執行階段的詳細資訊，請參閱[用戶端指令碼在 ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)。For more information about using client scripts at run time, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa). > [!NOTE] > 類別代表`script`在最後剖析和用戶端瀏覽器中執行的設計階段的項目。The class represents `script` elements at design time that are ultimately parsed and run in the client browser. 因為`script`產生的項目物件不會在伺服器上執行，不包含的項目`runat="server"`屬性。Because the `script` elements that are generated for the objects are not run on the server, the elements do not contain the `runat="server"` attribute.

related.span: 在 ASP.NET Web Pages 中的用戶端指令碼

span.span: Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public ClientScriptItem (string text, string source, string language, string type, string id);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string text, string source, string language, string type, string id) cil managed
Public Sub New (text As String, source As String, language As String, type As String, id As String)
public: ClientScriptItem(System::String ^ text, System::String ^ source, System::String ^ language, System::String ^ type, System::String ^ id);
new System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem : string * string * string * string * string -> System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem
MemberSignature.Usage: new System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem (text, source, language, type, id)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: text
param.span: 項目的內容；要在用戶端上執行的指令碼陳述式字串。

span.span: The contents for the element; a string of script statements to run on the client.

param.name: source
param.span: 項目的 屬性值，指定用戶端指令碼內容的外部來源位置。

span.span: The attribute value for the element, specifying an external source location for the client script contents.

param.name: language
param.span: 項目的 屬性值，指定指令碼陳述式的語言。

span.span: The attribute value for the element, specifying the language of the script statements.

param.name: type
param.span: 項目的類型屬性值，表示關聯之指令碼引擎的 MIME 類型。

span.span: The type attribute value for the element, indicating the MIME type for the associated scripting engine.

param.name: id

span.span: The ID for the element.

param.span: 設計主應用程式 (例如，[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]) 需要這個引數。

span.span: This argument is required by the design host (for example, [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]).

summary.span: 使用提供的參數初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化陳述式物件，使用其中一種`text`或`source`（非兩者） 的參數。Initialize the statements for the object by using either the `text` or `source` parameter (not both). 使用`text`初始化使用的輸入的字串，包含的陳述式的指令碼。Use `text` to initialize the script using an input string that contains the statements. 或者，使用`source`初始化使用的路徑包含指令碼陳述式的指令碼。Alternately, use `source` to initialize a script using a path that contains the script statements. 您可以指定任何輸入參數為`null`或空字串 ("");使用輸入的值，設定對應的屬性和`script`缺少該屬性就會產生元素。You can specify any of the input parameters as `null` or an empty string (""); the corresponding property is set using the input value, and the `script` element is generated without that property. 使用`null`或空字串 ("") 會產生下列結果：Using `null` or an empty string ("") generates the following results: - 針對`text`，對應`script`元素未包含指令碼陳述式。For `text`, the corresponding `script` element does not contain script statements. - 針對`source`，則`src`屬性中未設定`script`項目。For `source`, the `src` attribute is not set in the `script` element. - 針對`language`，則`language`屬性中未設定`script`項目。For `language`, the `language` attribute is not set in the `script` element. 當用戶端指令碼區塊未指定的指令碼語言時，用戶端瀏覽器會決定語言。When a client script block does not specify the script language, the client browser determines the language. - 針對`type`，則`type`指令碼項目中未設定屬性。For `type`, the `type` attribute is not set in the script element. 當用戶端指令碼區塊不指定指令碼類型時，用戶端瀏覽器會決定類型。When a client script block does not specify the script type, the client browser determines the type. - 針對`id`，設計主應用程式 (例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]) 將會擲回。For `id`, the design host (for example, [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]) will throw an .

exception.span: 為 null (由設計主應用程式擲回)。

span.span: is null (thrown by the design host).

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得用戶端指令碼項目的 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the attribute value for the client script element.

value.span: 針對 項目中的 屬性所指定的語言名稱。

span.span: The language name specified for the attribute in the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示撰寫指令碼陳述式的語言。The property represents the language in which the script statements are written. 如果屬性是`null`或空字串 ("")，則`language`中未設定屬性`script`項目。If the property is `null` or an empty string (""), the `language` attribute is not set in the `script` element. 當用戶端指令碼區塊未指定的指令碼語言時，用戶端瀏覽器會決定語言。When a client script block does not specify the script language, the client browser determines the language. 屬性由初始化建構函式。The property is initialized by the constructor.

related.span: 在 ASP.NET Web Pages 中的用戶端指令碼

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定用戶端指令碼內容的外部來源位置。The property specifies an external source location for the client script contents. 一般而言，如指令碼陳述式`script`項目使用指定的其中一個或屬性。Typically, the script statements for a `script` element are specified using either the or property. 如果屬性是`null`或空字串 ("")，則`src`中未設定屬性`script`項目。If the property is `null` or an empty string (""), the `src` attribute is not set in the `script` element. 屬性由初始化。The property is initialized by the .

span.span: The script statements contained in the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示中所包含的陳述式`script`項目。The property represents the statements that are contained in the `script` element. 一般而言，如指令碼陳述式`script`項目使用指定的其中一個或屬性。Typically, the script statements for a `script` element are specified using either the or property. 如果屬性是`null`或空字串 ("")，則`script`元素未包含任何指令碼陳述式。If the property is `null` or an empty string (""), the `script` element does not contain any script statements. 屬性由初始化建構函式。The property is initialized by the constructor.
